<title level="1" pfs="">[Cultist](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3534)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Cultists have passed an initiation ritual to a secret sect or organization; now, they devote themselves to achieving their most perfect spiritual form.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Cultist.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Cultist](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3534)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 97

**Perception** +4

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +3, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +3, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44) +4, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** +1

**Wis** -1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
cultist garb (functions as [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=41)), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), occult text

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +4 (or +2 vs. higher-ranking members of the cult)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing

**Fanatical Frenzy** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The cultist has taken damage and is neither [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=73) nor already in a frenzy; **Effect** The cultist flies into a frenzy that lasts 1 minute. While frenzied, the cultist gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls, and they take a –2 penalty to AC. The cultist can't voluntarily stop their frenzy. After their frenzy, the cultist is fatigued.

</column>
